enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve updating the state of the OptionGroup by adding or selecting an Option.
The addOption method requires an Option object, which can be initialized using the Option constructor.
The getNames method returns the names of the options in the group, which can be used to verify the addition of a new option.
The getOptions method returns the collection of options in the group, which can be used to verify the addition of a new option.
